Content: Underworld gang leader Makandure Madush who was arrested in Dubai and deported arrived in the country this morning. He was arrested by the CID at the Katunayaka International Airport. He was arrested with another group of people during a party in Dubai. Makandure Madush and the group were arrested by Dubai Police on the charges of keeping and using drugs. Following a blood test, it was confirmed that a group including Madush had used cocaine. Police Media Spokesman said Masudh was taken to CID Headquarters after being questioned.
